theRetrospect:AntiqueClock.NAME: Antique Clock
theRetrospect:AntiqueClock.FLAVOR: A keepsake you obtained before you left the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your first turn, play 1 #ytheretrospect:Rewind.

theRetrospect:QuantumHourglass.NAME: Quantum Hourglass
theRetrospect:QuantumHourglass.FLAVOR: An hourglass that drips both ways simultaneously.
DESCRIPTIONS: When a timeline #ytheretrospect:collapses, gain [E] next turn.

theRetrospect:ShatteredMirror.NAME: Shattered Mirror
theRetrospect:ShatteredMirror.FLAVOR: The cracks are invisible when viewed from a specific angle.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #ytheretrospect:construct a timeline, gain 5 Block.

theRetrospect:BottledSingularity.NAME: Bottled Singularity
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose 3 cards and obtain a special Curse. Start each combat with these cards in your hand.
Start each combat with the 3 bottled cards in your hand.

theRetrospect:AtomicClock.NAME: Atomic Clock
theRetrospect:AtomicClock.FLAVOR: Spectacular foreign technology. Why is it here?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #pAntique #pClock. At the end of your first turn, play 1 #ytheretrospect:Chaotic_Offense.

theRetrospect:SmartCollar.NAME: Smart Collar
theRetrospect:SmartCollar.FLAVOR: A modern synchronization device suspiciously located in the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b7th timeline you #ytheretrospect:construct borrows #b1 HP only.

theRetrospect:AnkleWeights.NAME: Ankle Weights
theRetrospect:AnkleWeights.FLAVOR: Adds extra swiftness to your steps once you take the weights off.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now #yTrain at rest sites. Each training draws 1 extra card at the start of each combat. (3 times max)
